title: 70. Anxiety, C-PTSD, & Codependency
description:
Hey sis!

In this episode, we are talking about something heavy & serious. We are talking about C-PTSD & anxiety and how it may show up in people who are codependent. We talk about how C-PTSD how can affect your sense of self, your identity, and your sense of well-being, you won't want to miss this one.

Click here to join the no more codependent thought patterns masterclass!
(or visit beatricekamau.com/programs)

Click here to get your FREE copy of my guide on Toxic Shame, the Inner Critic, & Low Self-Esteem
(or visit beatricekamau.com/freeguide)

Business Inquiries?

IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
